member.name: P:CCP.My.Resources.Resources._New
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Version 26 1. Bug fix 1.1 In product magrins show material when material is dobule clicked also labour. 1.2 Make the overhead allocation field editable when creating a new company 1.3 When creating a quote from costing the customer and the quantity will now pull through 2. Create production order facility. 3. Create job card facility.
Version 25 1. Solve the change database problem 2. Handle issues regarding 0 VAT charges 3. Create ability to copy a product to a new product in [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:CCP.My.Resources.Resources.SqlScript_1
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to USE [CCP] GO
/****** Object: View [dbo].[lstReceiptDeposit] Script Date: 23/03/2017 9:50:01 AM ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[lstReceiptDeposit] AS SELECT FK_tblQuotHeader, fk_tblInvoiceHeader, txtReceiptType, MAX(dteReceiptDate) AS ReceiptDate, SUM(dblAmount) AS ReceiptAmount FROM dbo.tblReceipts WHERE (txtReceiptType = N'Deposit') GROUP BY FK_tblQuotHeader, fk_tblInvoiceHeader, txtReceiptType
GO
USE [CCP] GO [rest of string was truncated]";.
